item.title: Raytheon pays $950 million to settle fraud and Qatar bribery charges - The Washington Post
item.description:
1. Raytheon pays $950 million to settle fraud and Qatar bribery charges  The Washington Post
  2. RTX will pay almost $1B for defrauding DOD, allegedly bribing Qatari official  Defense One
  3. RTX Agrees to More Than $950 Million in Penalties to Settle Qatar Bribery, Contract Fraud Charges  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Defense Contractor Raytheon Agrees to Pay $252M Penalty to Resolve Qatar Bribery Charges  Military.com
  5. Defence group RTX to pay $950mn to resolve US charges over Qatar bribes  Financial Times
